description: As a customer I want to see a list of transactions via api
name: Etherscan Transactions REST API

steps.name: I submit the GET request for a list of transactions "https://api.etherscan.io/api?module=account&action=txlist&address=0xddbd2b932c763ba5b1b7ae3b362eac3e8d40121a&startblock=0&endblock=99999999&sort=asc&apikey=HJBWP2H2H3BICSFCBT8AIJEZ4DYZDJDANH"
I validate block number to be not null for each of transactions
